overview: Uncle Frank is a documentary directed by Matthew Ginsburg, who trailed his 85-year-old great uncle Frank Pour on his musical journey through his golden years.  Frank lives in the once booming mill town of Rome, N.Y., with his wife of 39 years.  A machinist who was forced into retirement, Frank taught himself to play keyboards and volunteered his vocal talents to a nearby nursing home.  Soon, he was touring all of them in the area, becoming a local hero in the process.
tagline: You're Never Too Old to be a Player
title: Uncle Frank
